you know what I love spring you know

learned first one has to do with music
you ever been listening to the ipod
feature on your iphone normally to
change anything yet to unlock your phone
go into the ipod menu pull up the
controls it was a complete waste of time
and it is a waste of time because you
don't actually have to do that all you
have to do double tap the home button
and you'll pull up ipod controls even if
your phone is locked not only that it'll
work for things like pandora as well as
your ipod second tip you may be familiar
with the home screen swipe to the right
and from there of course you can search
for contacts calendar dates emails apps
but at the very bottom of the search
results our two buttons one says search
the internet the other says search
wikipedia instead of having to fire up
safari or go into a nap you've got that
feature right there it's one swipe away
the last one has to do is if you like to
communicate in other languages you can
actually pull up international keyboards
and you can do that by going into
settings going into general going into
keyboard going into international
keyboard and selecting as many keyboards
as you want once you do that a little
globe icon will appear next to the space
bar on your keyboard if you touch and
hold the globe button then you'll see a
little pop-up menu and you can jump to
whichever keyboard you want to use
